specie_description: The tiger (Panthera tigris) is the largest extant cat species and a member of the genus Panthera.
The oak tree is a member of the genus Quercus and the beech family, Fagaceae.
The elephant is the largest existing land animal, with males of the largest subspecies standing over 3 m (10 ft) tall at the shoulder and weighing up to 6,000 kg (13,000 lb).
The sunflower (Helianthus annuus) is a living annual plant with a large flower head (capitulum).
